channel.description: The latest sports news from CBSSports.com
channel.title: CBSSports.com Headlines

item.title: Candid Coaches: Would your team visit Donald Trump in the White House if it won the national title?
item.description: CBS Sports' college basketball experts polled more than 100 coaches about potential White House visits
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: College Basketball Podcast: Michael Avenatti brings former Duke star Zion Williamson back into the headlines
item.description: Gary Parrish and Matt Norlander also discuss the end of the so-called 'Rich Paul Rule'
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: Michael Avenatti files motion alleging Nike arranged payments for Zion Williamson, Romeo Langford and others
item.description: An explosive motion to dismiss extortion charges against Stormy Daniels' former lawyer was filed Wednesday
item.dc:creator: Matt Norlander

item.title: Athletic directors concerned they could face prison sentences because of new NCAA legislation
item.description: A new NCAA policy has ADs worried about an increased risk of criminal charges
item.dc:creator: Dennis Dodd

item.title: College basketball recruiting: Michigan coach Juwan Howard extends scholarship offer to son Jace
item.description: Juwan Howard's son, a 6-foot-7 standout forward, has been offered by his father's alma mater and employer
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: From Zion Williamson to Harry Giles, ranking all 19 Duke one-and-done players under Coach K
item.description: Where each Blue Devil who left for the NBA Draft after just one season ranks top to bottom
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: College basketball rankings: Oregon lands a 5-star center and is now in the early Top 25 And 1
item.description: N'Faly Dante committed to Oregon which is now a top-15 team in our early rankings
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: After repealing the 'Rich Paul Rule' the NCAA should stop listening to the Commission on College Basketball
item.description: The NCAA fixed a mistake, but should fix another one -- the formation of the Commission on College Basketball
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: NCAA reverses course, changes stipulation in 'Rich Paul Rule' so that agents no longer need a bachelor's degree
item.description: It took less than a week for public backlash, and feedback from professional agents, to get the NCAA to flip
item.dc:creator: Matt Norlander

item.title: The 13 most debatable and surprising teams in Ken Pomeroy's ranking of all 353 college basketball programs
item.description: How does UConn, which has more national titles than any school in the past 25 years, not even crack the top 15?
item.dc:creator: Matt Norlander

item.title: LeBron James' agent, Rich Paul, rips the NCAA for its 'Rich Paul Rule' requiring agents to have college degrees
item.description: Paul expressed concern over the NCAA's new athlete-representation criteria
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: NCAA suspends BYU's leading scorer for nine games due to NBA Draft paperwork errors
item.description: New coach Mark Pope has a great roster in place, but he'll be without star Yoeli Childs for the first leg of the season
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Texas guard Andrew Jones cleared for basketball activities in effort to return from leukemia
item.description: Jones is looking to make a full return to the court after playing just 12 games the last two seasons
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Four college basketball players whose decision to return for another season could pay off the most
item.description: Here are the players who have the most to gain by returning to school
item.dc:creator: Matt Ward

item.title: NCAA responds to criticism over 'Rich Paul Rule' by explaining why it wants agents to have a college degree
item.description: LeBron James and many others opposed the changes to rules regarding agents, but the NCAA is holding firm
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Arizona loses point guard Brandon Williams for 2019-20 season due to knee injury
item.description: The Wildcats are losing their top returning scorer from last season
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: The 'Rich Paul Rule' is another misguided attempt by the NCAA to control something it shouldn't be controlling
item.description: New NCAA standards for agents just means players will deal with uncertified agents under the table — like they always have
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: Auburn basketball self-imposed a recruiting ban for six months after Chuck Person's 2017 arrest
item.description: The Tigers didn't conduct any recruiting activities from September 2017 to April 2018
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: College Basketball Podcast: The 'Rich Paul Rule' is another bad attempt by the NCAA to control players
item.description: Gary Parrish and Matt Norlander also discuss Evan Mobley's commitment to USC
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: NCAA raises bar for criteria of agents representing players who want to test waters of NBA Draft
item.description: The adapting of the new standards is being dubbed the 'Rich Paul Rule'
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Ranking college basketball's top graduate transfers who will play for new teams in 2019-20
item.description: UNC and Gonzaga each have two new grad transfers who are in our top 15
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: NCAA places Utah men's basketball program on probation due to recruiting violations
item.description: The NCAA reversed an original proposed penalty of a two-game suspension for Utes coach Larry Krystkowiak
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Purdue Fort Wayne leaving Summit League to join Horizon League for the 2020-2021 season
item.description: The Mastodons will play one more season in the Summit League before joining the Horizon League
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: D.J. Cooper fails FIBA drug test for using pregnant girlfriend's urine, reportedly suspended for two years
item.description: The former Ohio standout was attempting to pass a drug test in order to play professionally in Bosnia
item.dc:creator: Chris Bengel

item.title: Meet the Division III star who used a YouTube video and USB drives of his games to land with a Big Ten team
item.description: Austin Hutcherson will make the jump from Wesleyan University to Illinois after signing with the Illini this weekend
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: College basketball recruiting: Evan Mobley, the No. 1 recruit in the nation, commits to USC
item.description: The top-rated player in the Class of 2020 will join his father, a Trojans assistant, and his brother, an incoming freshman
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Could, and should, five-star recruit Bryce Thompson follow the Trae Young-path by staying in his native Oklahoma?
item.description: Oklahoma State has a shot at landing one of its top recruiting classes if it can keep the Tulsa product in the Sooner State
item.dc:creator: Matt Norlander

item.title: Five-star recruit MarJon Beauchamp says he will skip college to prepare for the 2021 NBA Draft
item.description: Beauchamp is the latest high school player who plans to skip college and enter the NBA Draft
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: Bracketology: Michigan State, Duke, Kentucky and Kansas are No. 1 seeds in early NCAA Tournament bracket prediction
item.description: The Spartans are the overall No. 1 seed in Jerry Palm's first look at next season's bracket
item.dc:creator: Jerry Palm

item.title: Duke, Kentucky and UNC are recruiting Paolo Banchero, but family ties to Washington make his choice tough
item.description: The mother and father of Banchero, the No. 4 player in the Class of 2021, both played sports for the Huskies
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: Daishen Nix is the No. 1 point guard in America, but after shunning the shoe companies his recruitment is a mystery
item.description: After growing up in Alaska, Nix has evolved into a five-star player -- yet no one knows which colleges he's prioritizing
item.dc:creator: Matt Norlander

item.title: Legendary broadcaster Max Falkenstien, the longtime voice of the Kansas Jayhawks, dies at 95
item.description: Falkenstien called KU basketball and football for 60 years before retiring in 2006
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: College basketball recruiting: Younger brother of Marvin Bagley III commits to Arizona State
item.description: Arizona State adds Marcus Bagley, a top-50 recruit who is the younger brother of the Kings' Marvin Bagley III
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone

item.title: College basketball prospects who commit early quickly turn into top recruiters for their new schools
item.description: After a recruit pledges to a school, they get to work on bringing in other top prospects to play with them
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: College Basketball Podcast: Will B.J. Boston's commitment spark another huge recruiting class for Kentucky?
item.description: Gary Parrish and Matt Norlander also discuss their time at the USA Basketball Junior National Team Minicamp
item.dc:creator: Gary Parrish

item.title: Kentucky basketball recruiting: B.J. Boston, five-star prospect in 2020 class, commits to Wildcats
item.description: The Wildcats have their first pledge in the 2020 class, and it's a big one
item.dc:creator: Kyle Boone
